name: Brian Kirk
info:
• 生日: 1968
  • 出生地: Armagh, Northern Ireland, United Kingdom
  • 国籍: Irish
detail: Brian Kirk (born 1968) is an Irish film and television director who has most recently directed episodes of Game of Thrones, FX's The Riches and Showtime's Brotherhood and The Tudors. He also directed the television film My Boy Jack starring David Haig and Daniel Radcliffe and based on the play of the same name.

works.name: Game of Thrones (Season 1) / 权力的游戏 第一季
